entry.title: Ask HN: What could a modern database do that PostgreSQL and MySQL can't
entry.summary: If there were a general-purpose OLTP SQL database that was developed today, what features or design decisions would it pick that PostgreSQL and MySQL cannot adapt for historic reasons? Or put another way, what are some cutting edge OLTP database techniques/features/architectures that PostgreSQL and MySQL would have a hard time supporting? Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=28425379 Points: 154 # Comments: 154
